I didn't sleep for a 4 day span in the past 2 weeks. I get so easily over-whelmed, and that feeling is really magnified when I stop dosing.
I only sleep hour stints, last week I was up for 4 days straight. Everything bothers me, my place is trashed from not doing crap for months,
I even bought at-home drug tests to try and see if benzos were still in my urine, it didn't show negative until Thursday of week 3.
Then my gf of 8 years had enough and moved. I knew once she left it was going to break me and I relapsed back into addiction but using Kratom instead.
